title: Andrei Mendel
text:
Andrei Semyonovich Mendel (; born 17 April 1995) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He plays for <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Biolog-Novokubansk%20Progress">FC Biolog-Novokubansk Progress</a> on 4 August 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Mashuk-KMV%20Pyatigorsk">FC Mashuk-KMV Pyatigorsk</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a> on 7 July 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Luch%20Vladivostok">FC Luch Vladivostok</a>.
